public class prgFiler
extends Object
Test file manager for source code files. You write the menu.

Author:
Ethan Georgi

prgFiler()
Constructor.

closeProgram()
Closes the file that was opened.
getNextChar()
Reads and returns next character in file.
getProgName()
Retrieve stored file name from fname
peekNextChar()
Returns next character without extraction.
retrieveProgram(String)
Opens named file if it exists, else writes error message and terminates execution.
seeErrorLines(int)
Displays 2 contiguous lines of file starting with line=linenum if linenum>1, else displays only first line.
seeProgramFile()
Displays entire file on output device.
store(String)
Save file name in fname (memory)

endOfProgram 
 public boolean endOfProgram

prgFiler 
 public prgFiler()
Constructor.

retrieveProgram 
 public void retrieveProgram(String filename)
Opens named file if it exists, else writes error message and terminates execution.

Parameters:
filename, - The string name of the file to open.
store 
 public void store(String filename)
Save file name in fname (memory)

Parameters:
filename, - The name to store in fname
getProgName 
 public String getProgName()
Retrieve stored file name from fname

Returns:
The name stored in fname
closeProgram 
 public void closeProgram()
Closes the file that was opened.

getNextChar 
 public char getNextChar()
Reads and returns next character in file.

Returns:
The next character in the open file.
peekNextChar 
 public char peekNextChar()
Returns next character without extraction.

Returns:
The next character in the open file.
seeProgramFile 
 public void seeProgramFile()
Displays entire file on output device. Includes line number for each program line, and simulates "more" @ 20 lines.

seeErrorLines 
 public void seeErrorLines(int linenum)
Displays 2 contiguous lines of file starting with line=linenum if linenum>1, else displays only first line.

Parameters:
linenum, - The line to begin displaying lines.
